thread.title: Lady GaGa Sports Baby Bump on 'AHS: Hotel' Set
thread.title_full: Lady GaGa Sports Baby Bump on 'AHS: Hotel' Set

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Lady GaGa Sports Baby Bump on 'AHS: Hotel' Set
text:
Comments The Mother Monster covers her fake baby bump in an early 1920s attire while filming what maybe flashback scenes. 
Lady GaGa is heavily pregnant in some photos taken from the filming set of " American Horror Story : Hotel". The Mother Monster sports a baby bump while wearing an early 1920s ensemble comprising of a patterned green coat and a long fur stole. The singer styled her hair in platinum blonde curls and covered it with a brown hat featuring green-and-gray detail. She completed her look with a pair of brown leather gloves, black shades and a black handbag. At one point, she's seen making her way to a yellow vintage car. GaGa depicts The Countess, a wealthy socialite who owns the titular hotal on the series. The character's been revealed to be a vampire, so GaGa probably filmed a flashback scene in which her character's still a human. "AHS: Hotel" aired its second episode on Wednesday, October 14 and has let fans take a peek into the next installment via a preview shared by FX. In "Mommy", "Alex hits a breaking point when Scarlett brings up memories of Holden and Donovan becomes a target of the Countess' rival." Also starring Matthew Bomer , Chloe Sevigny , Angela Bassett and Finn Wittrock among others, the anthology horror will return October 21 on FX at 10.00 P.M.
